Comment 3: 
I think the pattern of firing off a bunch of goroutines that defer a WaitGroup.Done or
defer send to a chan struct{} and waiting at the end of a program could be quite common.

In other words, I think other people might write this same race (on a grander scale),
and I'm wondering if there's something to be done in general to finish handling
panicking goroutines before dropping out of main?
